Number of common shares repurchased | 12 | 10 | 8
Repurchase value | $ 1,014 | $ 966 | $ 621

paragraph 1: Share Repurchase Program
paragraph 2: In both fiscal 2019 and 2018, our board of directors authorized increases of $1.5 billion in our share repurchase program. Common shares repurchased under the share repurchase program were as follows:
paragraph 3: At fiscal year end 2019, we had $1.5 billion of availability remaining under our share repurchase authorization.
